title: 09/10/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 09/10/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to the first game of the NFL season by laying out the main difference between the defending Super Bowl champion Tampa Bay Buccaneers and the Dallas Cowboys. He remains in awe of Tom Brady at the age of 44 after throwing 4 touchdown passes and almost 380 yards in their win over Dallas. Colin gives his Blazing 5 picks for week 1 of the 2021 NFL season. Plus, 3 time Super Bowl Champion Eric Mangini joins the show to tell Colin if the Cowboys can win with Dak Prescott as the focal point of their offense.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
